resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82052</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82052</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4479</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Describing a Personality</string>
            <string language="es">Descripción de una personalidad</string>
            <string language="ga">Cur Síos ar Phearsantacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreiben einer Funktionseigenschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décrire une personnalité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrevendo uma personalidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione della personalità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή μιας προσωπικότητας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A graphic of a person is presented and children are asked to describe the person, with the emphasis on personality traits rather than actions.</string>
            <string language="es">Se presenta la imagen de una persona y se pide a los niños que describan a la persona, poniendo énfasis sobre los rasgos de la personalidad más que en las acciones.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tugtar grafaic duine de na daltaí agus iarrtar orthu cur síos ar an duine, le béim ar thréithe pearsanta seachas a ngníomhaíochtaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Graphik einer Person wird dargestellt und 
Kinder werden gebeten, die Person, mit dem Hauptgewicht auf 
Funktionseigenschaftmerkmalen anstatt die Tätigkeiten zu beschreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un graphique d'une personne est présenté et des 
enfants sont invités à décrire la personne, avec l'emphase sur des 
traits de personnalité plutôt que des actions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um gráfico de uma pessoa é apresentado e as 
crianças são pedidas para descrever a pessoa, com a ênfase em 
traços da personalidade melhor que ações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un grafico di una persona è presentato ed i 
bambini sono chiesti di descrivere la persona, con l'enfasi sulle 
caratteristiche di personalità piuttosto che le azioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας γραφικός ενός προσώπου παρουσιάζεται και τα 
παιδιά καλούνται να περιγράψουν το πρόσωπο, με την έμφαση στα 
γνωρίσματα προσωπικότητας παρά τις ενέργειες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4479</entry>

        <educational>

        <rights>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        <classification>
